info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 8:47PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hillsdale County through 930 PM EDT... At 847 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Addison, or 11 miles southwest of Vandercook Lake, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesville and Hillsdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
